title: Derailed: Trailer
description: In 2010, Wisconsin got a federal grant to build a high-speed rail line between Madison and Milwaukee. Derailed is the story of how the rail project came together, how it fell apart and how Wisconsin changed along the way.
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
itunes:title: Derailed: Trailer
